definition: to argue pointlessly/to talk incessant nonsense/to blather
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
to wear out the skin of one's teeth (idiom); pointlessly blather/to talk incessant nonsense/blah blah

sentences.english: Jem decided there was no point in quibbling and was silent.
sentences.chinese: 杰姆觉得跟他磨嘴皮子没意思，于是便不再做声了。

sentences.english: It'll take a hell of [a lot of] talking to settle this.
